movie.title: O Aleijadinho
movie.description_intro: A brief piece on one of the greatest Brazilian artists of all time, Antônio Francisco Lisboa, the Aleijadinho. An important representant of the Baroque period in Brazil, Aleijadinho was famous for his artistic sculptures and figures made in soapstone, part of the many historical churches and other architetural monuments all located in Minas Gerais.
movie.description_full: A brief piece on one of the greatest Brazilian artists of all time, Antônio Francisco Lisboa, the Aleijadinho. An important representant of the Baroque period in Brazil, Aleijadinho was famous for his artistic sculptures and figures made in soapstone, part of the many historical churches and other architetural monuments all located in Minas Gerais.

movies.title: What Happened, Miss Simone?
movies.summary: On stage Nina Simone was known for her utterly free, uninhibited musical expression, which enthralled audiences and attracted life-long fans. But amid the violent, haunting, and senseless day-to-day of the civil rights era in 1960s America, Simone struggled to reconcile her artistic identity and ambition with her devotion to a movement. Culled from hours of autobiographical tapes, this new film unveils the unmitigated ego of a brilliant artist and the absurdities of her time. At the height of her fame Simone walked away from her family, country, career and fans, to move to Liberia and give up performing. The story of her life leading up to that event poses the question, 'how does royalty stomp around in the mud and still walk with grace?'

movies.title: Expedition Happiness
movies.summary: Two free spirits, one dog. Traveling the vast spaces of an enormous continent in search of something more.

movies.title: Love Means Zero
movies.summary: Nick Bollettieri coached a generation of tennis champions, but his relentless desire to win cost him the relationship he valued most.
movies.description_full: Nick Bollettieri coached a generation of tennis champions, but his relentless desire to win cost him the relationship he valued most.
